plot: The lone survivor of a nuclear attack reflects on her last moments before the explosion and questions the role of God in a world so close to ruin.
title: Asleep in the Chapel
plot_es: The lone survivor of a nuclear attack reflects on her last moments before the explosion and questions the role of God in a world so close to ruin.
plot_en: The lone survivor of a nuclear attack reflects on her last moments before the explosion and questions the role of God in a world so close to ruin.
